Articles.Content:
This is the TCS Victory from Wing Commander III. In the Wing Commander universe, it's a Yorktown-class light carrier in use by the Confederation.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The ship itself is practically hollow... the sides are held together by a single fuselage piece inside the 'hangar'. The wall structures on the top and bottom were attached to the sides and strutted together. In the 'hangar', there's two small docking ports... one in the front and one in the back. I also added solar panels and some thermoelectric generators. The engines used are nuclear engines. Given that this is a captial ship, hyperedit was the only option... I might add some things and use different engines later...

Mod used: B9 Aerospace

Craft File: http://www./view/0d6cdfgf98k1a8s/TCS_Victory.craft
